title: How do you skip a division

embed.description: Cokeburst321 / Silver 4 0LP / 21W 10L Win Ratio 68% / Yasuo - 6W 1L Win Ratio 86%, Kled - 4W 1L Win Ratio 80%, Kayn - 3W 1L Win Ratio 75%, Pantheon - 0W 3L Win Ratio 0%, Malphite - 2W 0L Win Ratio 100%

body: how hard is it to skip a division? i recently won 15 games and lost 2 in Silver V and i thought i was going to skip a division because of my winstreaks. Also do you think if I win a couple more games and reach S4 promos(and win them) will i skip a division? Thanks.

replies.body: i know it may not be accurate but op.gg said i had a silver 2 mmr when i was in my silver 5 promos
